Package tk.shardsoftware.entity

Class EntityCannonball

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.shardsoftware.entity.Entity
      • tk.shardsoftware.entity.EntityCannonball
  • public class EntityCannonball
extends Entity
    Cannonballs do damage to other entities that can be damaged.
    Author:
    James Burnell
    See Also:
    IDamageable, ICannonCarrier

      • EntityCannonball

                        float x,
                        float y,
                        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 dirVec,
                        ICannonCarrier parentObj)
        Constructor for EntityCannonball
        Parameters:
        worldObj - Instance of World, the world the cannonball will be a part of
        x - the x-position of the cannonball
        y - the y-position of the cannonball
        dirVec - the initial direction of the cannonball
        parentObj - the entity which shot the cannonball
